channel.title: Substrings
channel.description:
Hi,
I have a question. How would I go about creating TWO substrings for a command instead of one? I'm trying to make a tempban command, but I'm having trouble inputting both the username AND the amount of time to ban. How would I make it so it's ::tempban (username) (time)?
Thank you.

item.title: Substrings
item.dc:creator: @timmarus1 timmarus1
item.description:
@timmarus1 wrote:

  1. There are other commands I’d like to use it for.

  2. I’ve been wondering how you can ban for a certain amount of time. Care to elaborate on how I would go about doing that?

Read full topic

item.title: Substrings
item.dc:creator: @ford_rock99 ford rock99
item.description:
@ford_rock99 wrote:

don’t do it like that, just make different commands like so.

1 - ::ban - forever
2 - ::ban1 = 1 hour
3 - ::ban2 = 2 hours
etc till i hit say 6 hours and then just double from there

Read full topic
